publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5587 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Gambling Act 2005 (Mandatory and Default Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Gambling Act 2005 (Mandatory and Default Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5587 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Gambling Act 2005 (Mandatory and Default Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Gambling Act 2005 (Mandatory and Default Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
